title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: Clean board, green light but no orange light and no S5 rails.

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message:
History fault, any sign of liquid, or dropped?

You must get orange light even without battery; check that.
Be sure to use original Magsafe 2 (two) charger 60/85W.

Post exact PPBUS_G3H and 3V42 voltages.
Check SMC_PM_G2_EN and post basic voltages for U7501.

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message:
No liquid clean board, no drops. Green light seem to come on sometimes, now with good know charger not green or orange light at all. 

PPBUS_G3H 12.27v 
PP3V42 3.426v 
[LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]SMC_PM_G2_EN 0v [/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

[LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]U7501 Vin Pin 23 12.27 Enable Pins 4,21,12 all are 0v[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: PPBUS is too low should be 12.56. Corrosion near or under it? SMC_RESET_L voltage?

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: Thanks, I just learned that ppbus should be 12.56, there is no corrosion on this board, looks clean, [LEFT][COLOR=#111111][FONT=inherit]SMC_RESET_L is 3.392v[/FONT][/COLOR][/LEFT]

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: Reflow the SMC. If no change, likely bad SMC or bad ISL6259. My guess is crap under SMC causing issue and reflow will fix it, but hard to say.

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: That was the first thing I did before posting here, but no luck, I will try again one more time and post back.

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message:
Reflow is wasting time now.
Reball SMC and change it, if no luck.

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message:
Ok SMC had some concentrated corrosion on pin 117 so bad that the pad was gone from both the board and the chip, reballing my first SMC went perfect, first try and all went well, I ran a wire to the pad on the board and solder the SMC again, but same problem.

I have a 820-3476 will the SMC from that board work on this 820-4924?

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: Any recommendation on where to get donor boards that may have good SMC chips?

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message:
820-4924.
And be sure pad and trace correctly rebuilt...

title: 820-4924 Green light but no orange light and no S5 rails
message: I ran a wire from C5005 to pin 117 on the board
